thread.title: Brian Molefe sworn in as an MP | IOL
thread.title_full: Brian Molefe sworn in as an MP | IOL

author: Siyabonga Mkhwanazi
title: Brian Molefe sworn in as an MP | IOL
text:
Brian Molefe sworn in as an MP Politics / 23 February 2017, 11:20am Siyabonga Mkhwanazi Brian Molefe 
Parliament – Former Eskom boss Brian Molefe has been sworn-in as an ANC MP on Thursday morning.This has ended speculation on the date for his swearing-in after Parliament confirmed last Friday he had been nominated as MP.However, his nomination had sparked divisions in ANC structures in the North West.Speculation has intensified that Molefe will succeed Finance Minister Pravin Gordhan, but the finance minister has refused to be drawn into the debate on his removal from the National Treasury.Speaker Baleka Mbete was expected to formally announce Molefe’s swearing-in during Thursday’s sitting of the National Assembly.Molefe’s nomination has been backed by the Progressive Professionals Forum, which said this week he would add value to Parliament and the Treasury, if he was eventually deployed there.Gordhan told journalists at the pre-Budget briefing on Wednesday that he served at the pleasure of the President. Political Bureau
